{{also|Schwimmen}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|swimmen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|swimman}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*swimmaną}}. Compare {{cog|nds|swimmen}}, {{cog|nl|zwemmen}}, {{cog|en|swim}}, {{cog|da|svømme}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʃvɪmən/}} * {{hyphenation|de|schwim|men}} * {{audio|de|De-at-schwimmen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-schwimmen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=3|schwimmt|[[schwamm]] or [[schwomm]]|auxiliary=both|geschwommen|past subjunctive=[[schwämme]] or [[schwömme]]}} # {{lb|de|intransitive|auxiliary: “haben” or “sein”}} to [[swim]] # {{lb|de|intransitive|auxiliary: “sein”}} to [[float]] # {{lb|de|intransitive|colloquial|auxiliary: “sein”}} to be [[flooded]] ====Conjugation==== preterite: schwamm, schwämme {{de-conj-strong|schwimm|schwamm|geschwommen|s|||schwämm|a}} preterite: schwomm, schwömme {{de-conj-strong|schwimm|schwomm|geschwommen|s|||schwömm|a}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Schwimmanzug}} * {{l|de|Schwimmbad}}, {{l|de|Schwimmhalle}} * {{l|de|Schwimmen}} * {{l|de|Schwimmer}} * {{l|de|Schwimmflügel}} * {{l|de|Schwimmhose}} * {{l|de|Schwimmweste}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
